I like that CS:CZ brings two single player mode for those who like CS but don't like competition.
Tour of Duty features normal CS gameplay(with bots),with some condition must fulfill in the play.
Deleted Scenes ask you to complete the missions you choose,sometimes with special gears you can't seen in normal CS gameplay.
除了BOT语音反复重复外，基本找不出别的缺点。

Condition zero franchise was shaded away because it was released the same year as source and half life 2 unfortunately. Living in the shadow of source it didn't got the attention it deserved and it got called out by community that it sucks. it becomes usual trend that people just say condition zero is lame without even trying it. This game has a Story campaign dedicated to it called "deleted scenes". The name is misleading thus many thought it's just normal condition zero but another version. The story campaign is just like a COD game but in Counter strike style, focusing on times where terrorism raged. It might sound bad but it can easily suck you in it with it's character development.  Gameplay is smooth although tbh it's an old game you may get frustrated in it but I never had problems running it on modern systems which is a really good aspect I might say. Each mission is located in different parts of the world where you are a different person assigned to certain mission to complete. It has smooth progress but in some parts although it is very very rare you might get confused. This game is worth every penny especially in sells. I am kind of disappointed that we didn't get another CS game like this. The deleted scenes alone is worth it. Now we get to the normal CS:CZ, it's improved CS 1.6 but didn't last long cause of source release. Valve killing their own game tbh. It's got fun CO-OP campaign missions where you assign a team from npcs which have their own cons and pros so you have to pay attention to that and go on vs terrorists and complete the challenges to progress, in each different map. This game has got so manyyyy maps! many you didn't get to experience in CSGO. It's worth playing in community servers for the sake of nostalegica, not other than that just like every game. Just imagine the whole thing as: Deleted scenes is the main game while normal CZ is a nice addition to it.

Впринципе, та же 1.6, но с другой физикой гранат и текстурами.

6/10
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Насчет однопользовательской версии:
Игра хорошая, но, не без своих приколов.
Примерно на середине игры я потерял интерес к прохождению, не знаю с чем связано, просто стало не интересно.
Разработчики многое обещали сделать, например пофиксить стрельбу, однако этого не произошло :D
С модельками оружия что-то не то, немного убогие, лучше бы уже модельки из 1.6 с измененными текстурами вставили.
В любом случае, у игры есть как положительные, так и отрицательные стороны.
Короче, сами купите и пройдите, может вам понравится.
Для меня 7/10
As always, counter-strike is fun, well designed, and strategic. It is outdated sure, but I highly advise you to try it out.
I think this is my favorite counter strike game! This game has Really challenging bots, fun single- and multiplayer and many maps! Really fun old game!
